author: ieb
msg: SLING-1251 Applied Patch from Ray Davis (Thanks) fixes acl policies after JR16 upgrade, and fixes a potential NPE.

author: dkulp
msg: [CXF-2545] When pushing a message onto a background thread, we need to
suck in all the data from the input stream and cache it as the transport
may close the original stream when the current stack unwinds.

author: dkulp
msg: [CXF-2591] Fix problem of handleFault not being called on interceptors
for transport exceptions with Async calls.

author: tomwhite
msg: HDFS-755. Read multiple checksum chunks at once in DFSInputStream. Contributed by Todd Lipcon.
